snippet.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution – It’s Time to Duel Trailer
snippet.description:
It’s Time to Duel! Build your Deck from over 9,000 cards to Duel against your friends or the world with Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution on Nintendo Switch! Relive 20 years of history from the original Yu-Gi-Oh! animated series through Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V, and challenge the newest generation of Duelists from the virtual world of Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS!

#NintendoSwitch #Yu-Gi-Oh #LinkEvolution

Pre-purchase now: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/yu-gi-oh-legacy-of-the-duelist-link-evolution-switch/
